name: kiddingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is clearly intended to be a joke and not serious: People ask him kiddingly why a star like him would spend time in a place like this. “What do you think of my French?” he asked, kiddingly. “Perfect,” came the reply.
More examplesFewer examplesHe likes to say, kiddingly, that only a handful of people saw his early films.She suggested, half kiddingly, that they could do family counselling. Sam nudged Al in the ribs kiddingly. "Would you like to invest a couple of million?"
